item.title: Extract and edit quotes from webinar - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor who can take a recorded webinar and cut it up into small clips for social.

We will provide:
- recorded webinar file
- pull quotes along with timing for the video clip

We want you to be able to remove parts of the video to isolate speakers. Map video on a background and deliver a repeatable template- similar to the example below.

Here's an in-market example- https://www.linkedin.com/posts/refine-labs_were-getting-creative-this-week-with-our-activity-7196530259838550016-nR0M?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop




Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 21:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Text Formatting, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Text Formatting, Graphic Design
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Birthday Video Reel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!

I am doing a video for a friend for her birthday! I have a series of videos recorded from various people, and I have images. I need to turn it in to a video. I would need it by Monday at 9am. I would send all of the assets by Friday end of day.

Hourly Range: $30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 21:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
